scripts.start: nodemon      run-rudinode-manager.js --hash $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --tag dev0 --conf .env/prodmanager-conf-custom.ini --node_env development --db ./db/rudi_manager.db --ignore "**/(front)/"
scripts.start:test: nodemon run-rudinode-manager.js --hash $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --tag dev0 --conf .env/prodmanager-conf-custom.ini --node_env development --db ./db/manager.db --su PHVzZXI+OjxoYXNoZWRfcHdkPg== --ignore "**/(front)/"
scripts.start:stg: nodemon  run-rudinode-manager.js --hash $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --tag dev0 --conf=.env/prodmanager-conf-custom.ini --node_env staging     --ignore "**/(front)/"
scripts.start:prod: nodemon run-rudinode-manager.js --hash $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --tag prod0 --conf=.env/prodmanager-conf-custom.ini --node_env production  --ignore "**/(front)/"
scripts.server:win: nodemon   run-rudinode-manager.js --ignore './(front|console)/*' --exec "Set RUDI_PROD_MANAGER_GIT_REV=git rev-parse --short HEAD& node"
scripts.server:linux: nodemon run-rudinode-manager.js --ignore './(front|console)/*' --exec "export RUDI_PROD_MANAGER_GIT_REV=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) ; node "
scripts.quality: npm run prettify && npm run lintBack -- --fix
